Automatic deployment of a p2 update site with Maven You can use the Maven Wagon plug-in to deploy your artifacts, e.g., to an ftp server.
To define the credentials to login to the server you can add an entry for the user credentials to your local ~/m2/settings.xml file.
You can then configure your pom.xml to use the wagon plug-in of Maven.
The following command will now deploy your artifacts to your ftp site.
